channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google Soundly Beaten By New AI Attacks—Change Your Browser
item.description: If Google's security doesn't work, the internet doesn't work — what to know.

item.title: Hong Kong Robot Startup Raises $10 Million From Foxconn To Power Elderly Care Expansion
item.description: The investment was the first tranche of Robocore’s Series D round, under which Foxconn will inject up to $30 million through 2027.

item.title: Why Saturday’s Rare ‘Black Moon’ Is A Celestial Milestone For Americans
item.description: The new moon on Saturday, Aug. 23, will be a seasonal “black moon” — a rare occurrence when four new moons fall within a single season. It has an intr...

item.title: New Black Hole Is 36 Billion Times Bigger Than The Sun, Scientists Say
item.description: Astronomers have detected a black hole, the most massive yet measured, in the Cosmic Horseshoe galaxy.

item.title: CableTime’s New 16-In-1 USB-C Dock Has Magnetic SSD Enclosure And Triple Display Support
